data.actual_result: server order changes randomly after restarting the app.
data.expected_result: server order doesn't change after you restart the app.
data.short_description: After restarting the app, server order changes randomly when joining new servers by accepting invites from dms.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone dm you a couple server link invites, (feel free to ask me send you the links) check your current server orders and then accept the invites one by one.  - After accepting the invites, check the order of servers again. - Restart the app and observe any changes of server orders. - Note: This bug might happens randomly, try reproduce a several time, because this it's not only happening to me. another user also encountered this bug.
